bio: I am Patrizia, an Imperial from Cyrodil. I was trained as a carpenter and love carving, first wood and then stone, which is my passion. Currently, I am working on a memorial statue for the cemetery in Falkreath. I can be hired to build Anduniel’s meadery in the quest.
name: Patrizia
notes: Shawn - Anna VA. Most similar to Isobel from 3DNPC
